nodes.text: Vibro-stars were a type of throwing vibro weapon utilized by Eye of the Nihil Marchion Ro, who kept several in a sheath along his wrist. The stars were incredibly sharp and able to cut effortlessly through many materials, including bone and metal. During a fight in the Great Hall of the Nihil, Ro used a star on Tempest Runner Kassav Milliko when the Weequay attempted to use a blaster he was carrying in contravention of the Great Hall's rules regarding weapons, slicing off half of Milliko's hand and the butt of the blaster.
